Thus, the function can be written as:

CREATE FUNCTION getNthHighestSalary(N INT) RETURNS INT
BEGIN
  SET N = N - 1;
  RETURN (
      SELECT DISTINCT salary
      FROM employees
      ORDER BY salary DESC
      LIMIT 1 OFFSET N
  );
END

            os.makedirs(dest_folder, exist_ok=True)
